resources.string: This new feature is coming soon !
You are using an older version of R6 Assistant, do you want to update it ?
Rate the application and give your feedback on the Play Store
Error : unable to find the Play Store App !
This is a BETA !\nIt means it could miss things. We are working on translation !
This is the number of ammo in a loader.
This is the Fire rate, it\'s the frequency at which a specific weapon can fire or launch its projectiles
This is the Damage Falloff, it\'s the range where you start doing less damage
Damage against an operator with 1, 2 or 3 of armor
Damage against an operator with 1, 2 or 3 of armor equipped with a rook armor
At the bottom of stats page, you can see the ranking of barrels. \nThe first is the one which had the most reliable spray to control.\n Anyways it\'s up to you and your playstyle.
Thanks a lot to Sergio for the sheet of stats ! Without him, nothing would have been possible. \nCLICK HERE to see his Youtube Channel
Thanks a lot to VarsityGaming as well, for its videos about attachment ! \nCLICK HERE to see his Youtube Channel
Fires an explosive Breach Round that burrows into a surface and automatically detonates.
Sets high-tension Shock Wire on metallic gadgets, dealing damage to enemies.
Has a backup mounted shield to swap if the first one gets damaged.
Triggers the flash attached to his ballistic shield to temporarily blind enemies.
Toggles under-barrel shotgun attachment on his main weapon.
Tactical crossbow firing asphyxiating bolts and micro smoke grenades.
Sets bulletproof barricades, more resistant than standard ones.
Caveira\'s predatory stealth, the "Silent Step" allows her to lurk on her prey, almost inaudible, until it\'s too late.
Fires a hypodermic shot to revive himself or teammates from a distance. Can also provide a temporary boost.
Hovering drone that releases disorienting sonic bursts. Yokai also transmits a video feed to the Echo and his team.
Uses a mechanical trap to incapacitate enemies.
Uses Cluster Charge that pierce and stick to walls, releasing sub-grenades on the opposing side.
Toggles a magnification scope with sophisticated image sensors outlining long range marks, even trough smoke.
A 40mm grenade launcher firing explosive pellets that can be detonated from a distance.
Uses the Electronics Detector to locate any electronics in range through obstacles such as walls.
Tracking eyewear that locates targets by revealing and identifying recent footsteps.
Uses an Active Defense system to intercept grenades before they detonate.
Sets booby traps on windows and door frames.
Deploys a one-way bulletproof mirror on breakable and reinforced walls. Also can be ejected to create a murder hole.
Can expand his Extendable Shield to offer full protection while standing.
Jams communications for remotely detonated gadgets or drones in its range.
Detects heartbeats at a short distance through obstacles.
Drops a supply bag full of armor plates for his team to use.
Uses a Breaching Hammer to breach through destructible surfaces.
Sets remote detonated toxic gas charges.
Deploys a Mounted LMG with a ballistic shield protecting the head from frontal shots.
Uses EMP Grenades to disable any electronics in range.
Sets an exotherrmic charge that destroys reinforced walls.
Uses two Shock Drones to disable traps or injure enemies. Deploys the first Shock Drone during the preparation phase.
Can set up "Black Eye" cameras, feed accessible by whole team via observation tools.
Cluster of flash charges that can either be anchored on surfaces or rolled out as a grenade.
Cloaked toxic mines injecting a compound which injures opponents and limits their speed.
Concussion proximity mines that can be anchored on surfaces, impairing hearing and causing a dizzying effect.
Double barrel that can fire both concussion and impact grenades.
Uploads a virus that forces enemy devices to emit a loud buzz, thereby compromising their position.
Vigil scans surrounding devices to wipe his image from cameras and drones.
The EE-ONE-D detects enemy movement, providing an overview of the battlefield.
The nanobots give the team a brief gain in HP and revives allies in a DBNO state.
A remote controlled bulletproof camera armed with a high-energy laser.
Deploys holograms of Alibi and tags hostile when fired upon.
Hi ! I\'m not a cop, please be respectful in chats. I\'ve made this app to help you, not to ban you.
This nickname is way too short !
Your app is out of date !
You need to update your app on the Play Store to use R6 Assistant Online.
If you leave the app, your team will be removed. You will need to create a new one.
If you leave the app, your profile will be removed. You will need to create a new one.
If your team is full, then you can remove it from team seeking players.
Are you sure that you want to leave ?
If you leave, your team will be removed, you will need to create a new one.
If you leave, your profile will be removed, you will need to create a new one.
There is no teams for the moment. If you are a team, add your team with the button at the bottom and wait players to join your room.
There is no players for the moment. If you are looking for players, add your profile with the button at the bottom and wait players to join your room.
Name of the team is way too short !
Your name is way too short !
How many players do you need ?

This application has been created by Khrys, just a random player of Rainbow Six Siege. The application is Open Source and not afiliated with Ubisoft.

Any feedback, bug report, or suggestion are really appreciated. As an Open Source application, you can acccess to the source code hosted on GitHub by clicking on the image right at the bottom of the page.

Khrys, developer and player.

This application is fully free, ads free, no paid features. By downloading it, giving your feedback or rating it you already did a lot for me, so thank you !

I spend a lot of time on it, and of course because I want it but if you want to donate something, the button is below. If you donate your name will appear in the app soon.

 Thanks a lot ! 
Khrys
You need to restart your application to apply the new language !
Plans are not available yet on this map !
TROLLED BY MEUFLO\n THE BETA TESTER
